column8: With fans such as Dick Sudhalter and Philip Larkin , Bill Davison was known for his heavy drinking and womanising as much as he was for his trumpet playing. With an energetic style, he remained in relative obscurity after he emerged during the 1920's, until the 40's and his association with Eddie Condon .
column21: A T-shirt celebrating Bill Davison, from weadmire.net
